This reflects a form of all-or-nothing thinking, where the Seeker feels that their financial issues have completely alienated them from their friends.

candidates.situation: I have been out of work for five weeks in quarantine due to testing positive for COVID-19.  I fear that my employer will not take me back to work even once I test negative.
trigger_quotes: Calling the customer service line is futile.
The computer just plays a recording that the agents are on other calls and then it disconnects the call.
candidates.explanation: The Seeker expresses an unrealistic belief that calling the customer service line is 'futile,' which suggests a sense of hopelessness and an all-or-nothing perspective on the situation. This indicates a belief that no effort will yield any results, which aligns with the definition of reality distortion.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Hi there, how are you feeling today?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Hello

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Hi :) Is there anything you'd like to talk about? Something on your mind?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I'm concerned about my job. I have been out of work for the past 5 weeks because I tested positive for COVID-19.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Oh I am so sorry to hear that! Are you at least getting sick pay? If not, are you getting advice about help you might be able to access?

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Oh I am so sorry to hear that! Are you at least getting sick pay? If not, are you getting advice about help you might be able to access?

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: (sorry for duplication, not sure what happened there!)

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: It just keeps getting better...  I applied for the Pandemic Unemployment Assistance and was approved.  The next day, I got an email asking me to verify my identity (I am fine with that.  It actually makes good sense.)...

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: So you have been getting some assistance?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: So I did as instructed and got the message on the website thanking me for verification.  The following week I got a physical letter saying I was approved and the award amount per week.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I have gone online once a week and qualified, as one is supposed to do, and still I have not received a cent.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I see, so you are really financially struggling at the moment? Is there anywhere else you could apply for assistance? What about a foodbank?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Calling the customer service line is futile.  The computer just plays a recording that the agents are on other calls and then it disconnects the call.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I hear you there - I spent a long time on hold for an official matter the other day. I guess that everyone is really desperate for help and advice right now.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I have been very fortunate.  People in my church have been bringing me food.  I plan on trying to go to the food bank Monday, if they are open.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I hope that they can help you. My partner and I have used one before and they were very helpful. I felt a bit ashamed but there was no judgement at all.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I actually got so tired of redialing the Department of Labor and Training that I sent an email to the Lieutenant Governor of the state asking for his assistance in getting the matter resolved.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: That sounds like a very positive thing to have done. I really hope that they pay some attention to you. This situation is not your fault!

candidates.situation: I found out that my boyfriend had been lying to me about his entire life, and so the future that he had said we were building towards was all but impossible. I'm trying to figure out if I should stay with him.
trigger_quotes: Should I give him time to prove himself now that he's backed into a corner.
It's one of my fears.
candidates.explanation: The Seeker expresses uncertainty and fear about the relationship, suggesting an unrealistic belief that the partner must prove himself under pressure, which implies a lack of trust in the relationship's stability. This can lead to all-or-nothing thinking about the relationship's future.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: LOL

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: And he's still married?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: And he brought his kids to my house so they could meet my kids. He had a conversation with them about why he and their mother had been living the way they had. (in seperate floors of the house)

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: That was two weeks ago.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: So, yes, he is.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Too soon to tell.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I can tell that you feel that you are being cheated here. I can't tell you what to do but don't you think you deserve better?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I guess that's what I'm trying to figure out. Should I give him time to prove himself now that he's backed into a corner.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: It's not for me to say but I wonder if he's really going to change as he has not already.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: That's not an easy question to answer. He treats me very well. Always has. And he is frantically trying to accomodate me, now htat I know.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I agree with you. It's one of my fears.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: How do your children feel about this? And his?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: MY children (6 and 9) have been living with him in their lives as a male figure who is growing into a father figure. He and I have been together for fifteen months, and part-time living together for six.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: This isn't a new relationship. That's part of the complication, too.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: His kids actually asked if they could come live with me while he and his (ex?) figured their shit out.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Yes, I can imagine that it is. It is always really difficult when children are involved. I know you would not want your children to be hurt

candidates.situation: the uncertainty surrounding the corona virus pandemic. the unavailability of jobs. lack of success get jobs applied for. No ease or comfort of end being in sight
trigger_quotes: it's almost depleted, been out of work now for nearly 9 months but still can't get unemployment support because of the property that I cannot get rid off else I will declared bankrupt by the mortgage lender
seems i am being penalised for working hard, saving and investing? I should have been on more holidays and lived all the way above my means!
candidates.explanation: The Seeker expresses a belief that they are being unfairly punished for their hard work and responsible financial behavior, which reflects an all-or-nothing thinking pattern. They also imply that their situation is hopeless, as they feel they cannot access support due to their circumstances, which can be seen as a form of catastrophizing.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I am sorry to hear that. Would you like to talk about anything specific?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: thank you, I just don't know what else to do to get a job?

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: So you're unemployed? I am sorry to hear that. Are you prepared to take jobs that are below your usual level just to get by for a while?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: have tried that but don't even get an interview

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: It's a very difficult time to be out of work, I know. I hope that there is something out there for you. Have you tried employment agencies?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: yes, I do not qualify for unemployment because I have savings above the min threshold and I also have rental property, which is currently loss making and I can't sell it because it's 30% below market value

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Well, on the plus side at least you do have savings .. hopefully this can give you some security for a while

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Are your family being supportive of your situation?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: it's almost depleted, been out of work now for nearly 9 months but still can't get unemployment support because of the property that I cannot get rid off else I will declared bankrupt by the mortgage lender

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Perhaps bankruptcy might not be a bad option? You would be eligible for some help then at least.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: family is not being fully supported compared to when I had full time job. had to get rid of one car and other things just to get by

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: but the cost is 7 years of my future???

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: So you feel as though you have been working hard all your life and now you need help and support and are not getting it

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: very well put. seems i am being penalised for working hard, saving and investing? I should have been on more holidays and lived all the way above my means!

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I know how you feel .. I sometimes feel I would have been better off if I'd just not bothered working!

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Anyway thank you for talking and I really hope things go better for you in the future :)

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: thank you for your help.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: You're welcome :) You need to press quit first and take the survey before I can :)

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: hello? :)

I am from USA but I don't speak English perfectly
candidates.explanation: The Seeker expresses a belief that their English skills are inadequate for employment opportunities, which reflects an all-or-nothing thinking pattern. They assume that because they don't speak English perfectly, they will not be hired, which is an unrealistic belief.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: amazon

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: There are plenty of jobs for freelance writers. Consider freelance content writing.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: What do you want to do as a Work From Home, Option?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: sure, I will. It has to be my native language though, i dont think they will hire me as an English writer

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: What is your native language?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: anything but something really stressful

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: You are not originally from the USA?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I am from USA but I don't speak English perfectly

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I wish I did but certainly writing is something I like

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Ok, you could be a tutor in your language for those who are native Engrish speakers.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I could write a book and self publish

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: yes! I thought about it, I should do it

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I believe that it could be a new career option.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: yes

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I believe that you can succeed for sure.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: thanks, I will try to find some providers

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: The key to success is having a positive attitude and believing in yourself.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: or I could start doing that on my own

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Awesome. I will keep in mind and I agree with you

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I did the self-publishing route a long time ago. I gave me conifdence to succeed.
